channel.title: How do you make something `Loop`
channel.description:
For example Woodcutting.
Instead of clicking for each log, how do you make it keep getting a log.
I hope you understand what i mean.

item.title: How do you make something `Loop`
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“Stanyer, post:21, topic:162561”][quote author=bryanc link=topic=221109.msg1913808#msg1913808 date=1196816115]
Amazing how people like you “Stanyer” get 100 rep.

I have what like 10 ? And I know how to do this at least…

Why do people rep for the stupidess things. You can’t even code.
[/quote]

Firstly… ZOMG PIXEL REP.

Secondly i could out-code you any time you like.

I own a very successfull forum (www.pkscape.net) which has over 1K members, and most uses online was 44 on sunday, the server isn’t even out.

Thirdly atm i’m coding a server from scratch.

Fourthly, if you can do it, show me :)[/quote]

Constructive criticism:

Secondly i could out-code you any time you like.

I don’t know why people are really proud of what they do in ‘Coding’ considering it is only like 10% real Java…

Thirdly atm i'm coding a server from scratch

Every single file?..

Read full topic

I own a very successfull forum (www.pkscape.net) which has over 1K members, and most uses online was 44 on sunday, the server isn’t even out.

Thirdly atm i’m coding a server from scratch.

Fourthly, if you can do it, show me
[/quote]

Also are you coding that server from scratch, or from an empty server base? Just curious. Signing up for forums…[/quote]

Scratch, made all the files by hand just looked at other servers to get the regular server methods like process() and Player implements Runnable.

Been working on it for like 3 months or so now
